param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling

param.name: count
param.label: Count
param.description: The number of items to display (default 5)

param.name: categoryId
param.label: Categories
param.description: If you want to select top results from specific categories, provide necessary categories id separated by commas. For example: 1,4,8

param.name: hideQuizName
param.label: Hide quiz name
param.description: Specify hide or not quiz name

param.name: ignoreGuest
param.label: Ignore guest
param.description: If this option is set to true the quiz results of anonymous users will not be taken into account

param.name: aggregateResults
param.label: Aggregate results
param.description: If this option is set to 'Yes', the best result for each quiz will be selected

param.name: aggregateUserResults
param.label: Aggregate user results
param.description: If this option is set to 'Yes', only one record will be selected for each user for each quiz. This option makes sense only if 'Aggregate results' is set to 'Yes'

param.name: emptyMessage
param.label: Empty message
param.description: This message will be shown if no quiz results
